page.title: 18Mobile Services
page.content: As this area is rural there are very few shops and a number of mobile services travel round to serve the community. The library van calls in Kelfield once a fortnight, in Stillingfleet once a week. A bread man delivers in Stillingfleet three times a week, Kelfield twice. Northern Dairies deliver milk and cream, door to door, every day.They also carry orange juice,bread, butter, eggs and potatoes.{ { Kelfield also has a mobile wet fish {van, a fruit & vegetable van, and a {fish and chip van calling once a {week.A mobile hairdresser calls by {appointment. In Kelfield also a local {woman cycles round morning and night {delivering newspapers.} The Woman's Royal Voluntary service runs a chiropody unit which visits Stillingfleet every three months.
